patthana16.80:4.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.80:4.3: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
patthana16.80:5.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
